{"id":1115761055,"question_id":3230,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1702133160,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1115761055/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Remove Adjacent Almost-Equal Characters","memory":"41.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int removeAlmostEqualCharacters(String word) {\n        \n        int res= 0 ;\n        int len = word.length();\n        boolean[] chg = new boolean[len];\n        for(int i=1; i<len; i++){\n            if(Math.abs(word.charAt(i)-word.charAt(i-1))<=1){\n               if(chg[i-1]) continue;\n               chg[i] = true;\n                res++;\n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"remove-adjacent-almost-equal-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
